sqlMap.select: select IC_ATTACH_ID, IC_INCIDENT_ID, TRANS_ID, ATTACH_PATH from IC_ATTACH where IC_ATTACH_ID = #icAttachId:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert: insert into IC_ATTACH (IC_ATTACH_ID, IC_INCIDENT_ID, TRANS_ID, ATTACH_PATH) values (#icAttachId:DECIMAL#, #icIncidentId:DECIMAL#, #transId:DECIMAL#, #attachPath:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update IC_ATTACH set IC_INCIDENT_ID = #icIncidentId:DECIMAL#, TRANS_ID = #transId:DECIMAL#, ATTACH_PATH = #attachPath:VARCHAR# where IC_ATTACH_ID = #icAttachId:DECIMAL#

update IC_ATTACH
IC_INCIDENT_ID = #icIncidentId:DECIMAL#
TRANS_ID = #transId:DECIMAL#
ATTACH_PATH = #attachPath:VARCHAR#
where IC_ATTACH_ID = #icAttachId:DECIMAL#
